Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at INTER-HOTEL La Terrasse in Tours, you'll be near the airport and close to Tours Cathedral and Vinci International Convention Centre. This hotel is within close proximity of Musee du Compagnonnage and Musee des Beaux-Arts.

Rooms
Stay in one of 49 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones and desks, and you can also request irons/ironing boards.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and supervised childcare/activities.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, multilingual staff, and a library. Planning an event in Tours? This hotel has facilities measuring 753 square feet (70 square meters), including meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and supervised childcare/activities.
Stay in one of 49 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones and desks, and you can also request irons/ironing boards.

When you stay at INTER-HOTEL La Terrasse in Tours, you'll be near the airport and close to Tours Cathedral and Vinci International Convention Centre. This hotel is within close proximity of Musee du Compagnonnage and Musee des Beaux-Arts.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Tours Cathedral - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Musee du Compagnonnage - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Musee des Beaux-Arts - 3.2 km / 2 mi
St. Julien Church - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Musee du Gemmail - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Place Plumereau - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Saint Martin Basilica - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Vinci International Convention Centre - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Francois Rabelais University - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Botanical Garden - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Parc des Expositions de Tours - 5.2 km / 3.2 mi
Prieure de St-Cosme - 5.3 km / 3.3 mi
Stade de la Vallee du Cher - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Priory of Lavaray - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi
Pole Sante Leonard de Vinci - 9.8 km / 6.1 mi

The nearest airports are:
Tours (TUF-Tours - Loire Valley) - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Tours (XSH-Saint Pierre des Corps SNCF Train Station) - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Paris (ORY-Orly) - 191.1 km / 118.7 mi

The preferred airport for INTER-HOTEL La Terrasse is Paris (ORY-Orly).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
